name: Qatar Airways
goal: Qatar Airways is the national air carrier of the State of Qatar. Headquartered in the Qatar Airways Tower in Doha, the airline operates a hub-and-spoke network, linking over 150 international destinations across Africa, Central Asia, Europe, Far East, South Asia, Middle East, North America, South America and Oceania from its base at Hamad International Airport, using a fleet of 200 aircraft.
interests: Budget, Climate Action, Competition, Environment, External Relations, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU-Qatar Comprehensive Air Transport Agreement negotiations, EU regulatory and aeropolitical affairs
